title: Who is Laurent Mekies? New Red Bull F1 team boss replacing Horner
summary: Laurent Mekies steps into the spotlight as the new Red Bull F1 team boss, succeeding Christian Horner and bringing a fresh chapter to the squad

qa_pairs.question: Who did Laurent Mekies replace as the team boss of Red Bull Racing?
What role did Laurent Mekies hold before becoming the team boss of Red Bull Racing?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He was previously associated with Scuderia Ferrari.
wrong_options: He was a race engineer at Mercedes.
He was a driver for Toro Rosso.
He was the chief strategist for McLaren.

qa_pairs.question: What is a significant change in Red Bull Racing with Laurent Mekies' appointment?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He brings a fresh chapter to the squad.
wrong_options: It marks the return of a previous team principal.
The team will switch to a different engine supplier.
The team is expected to focus solely on driver development.
